extendedIngredients.name: canned tomatoes
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 10 ounce can diced tomatoes with green chilies

extendedIngredients.name: fresh cilantro
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1½ cups chopped fresh cilantro (I'm not a cilantro fan so I omitted this)
metaInformation: (I'm not a cilantro fan so I omitted this)

recipes.title: Teedo's Famous Salsa

winePairing.pairingText: Salsa works really well with Pinot Noir, Riesling, and Sparkling rosé. Acidic white wines like riesling or low-tannin reds like pinot noir can work well with Mexican dishes. Sparkling rosé is a safe pairing too. One wine you could try is Sanctuary Bien Nacido Vineyard Pinot Noir. It has 4 out of 5 stars and a bottle costs about 33 dollars.

productMatches.title: Sanctuary Bien Nacido Vineyard Pinot Noir
productMatches.description: The wine at first has a light ruby color. It has aromas of black cherry/cherry and violets with the characteristic Bien Nacido dried herbs and light pepper spice balanced by the toasty oak spice and vanilla influence of French oak barrel aging. There are flavors of cherry and red berry with dried herbs followed by a light pepper spice. The sweet oak spice and vanilla is nicely balanced by the fruit flavors. The wine is concentrated and elegant with a rich mouthfeel and lingering finish.

recipes.instructions: In a food processor, add all the ingredients and pulse to desired consistency.Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to two weeks.

steps.step: In a food processor, add all the ingredients and pulse to desired consistency.Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to two weeks.
